channel.title: Battlescape private messaging
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just checked out the Battlescape base and it doesn't seem to have a functioning private messaging system. I was wondering if it is a cause of one of the edits I have made, or if it does not have working private messaging yet?
All help is appreciated.
Thank you.
